piedao.max.mint.notice: At the moment you only have enough funds to mint
piedao.max.withdraw.notice: At the moment you only have enough funds to withdraw
piedao.more.tokens.notice: To proceed you will need more of these tokens
piedao.multi.asset.enables.minting: Multi Asset entry enables you to mint
piedao.multi.asset.enables.withdraw: Multi Asset enables you to withdraw
piedao.please.connect.wallet: Please connect a wallet and try again.
piedao.single.asset.coming.soon: Single Asset entry / exit coming soon!

simulator.treasury.liquidity.deployed:
Treasury Liquidity Deployed
PieDAO is managing a treasury coming from product fees and other services the organisation offers. A committe of expert is deploying those assets into yield generating strategies, so you can also make $$$
simulator.rewards.distribution:
Rewards Distribution
Revenues coming from fees and yield farming will be, for the major part, distibuted monthly directly to veDOUGH holders in the form of rewardsPie that, among others, might contain BAL, SUSHI, CRV and DOUGH
simulator.total.staked.ve.dough:
Total Staked veDOUGH
Once staked, DOUGH becomes veDOUGH proportionally to the locking period. If locked for 3 years 1 DOUGH = 1 veDOUGH.
simulator.total.staking.commitment:
Total Staking Commitment
Users can decide to stake their DOUGH with different locking periods, which will result in different amount of veDOUGH they hold (the more veDOUGH you hold, the more the voting power and monthly rewards).
simulator.expected.apr:
Expected Apr
The expected growth rate of the treasury thanks to the farming activities and revenues coming from the Pies and other custom services the DAO is providing
simulator.rewards.unclaimed:
Rewards Unclaimed
Rewards will be calculated monthly and become claimable to veDOUGH holders that have been participating in governance. If a members do not participate for more than 3 months, they loose the right to claim the rewards for the previous months. Those rewards will be distributed to active members instead.
simulator.your.staked.dough:
Your Staked DOUGH
The amount of DOUGH you are going to stake. Please note that the resulting amount of veDOUGH is going to be determined by the commitment period
simulator.your.staking.commitment:
Your Staking Commitment
This is the time you will stake your DOUGH. The higher the commitment the higher the amount of veDOUGH received, therefore the higher the voting power and the monthly rewards
